title: Win Streaks

embed.description: Hat TrickGG / Gold 3 77LP / 136W 129L Win Ratio 51% / Udyr - 30W 17L Win Ratio 64%, Gangplank - 19W 23L Win Ratio 45%, Lee Sin - 6W 15L Win Ratio 29%, Nunu - 11W 4L Win Ratio 73%, Hecarim - 8W 7L Win Ratio 53%

body:
Will you get punished for playing a cetain strategy like (Kayle top support + Yi jungle)
and going on a win streak?
I was just wondering, because one of my friends got banned because he went on a big win streak and got banned for (MMR Boosting).

replies.body: You won't get banned just for using a unique strategy. I can't really talk about what happened to your friend, but if he was banned for MMR boosting it's not due to his win streak. MMR boosting is effectively cheating the system.
